title: Media Coverage
description: Latest news and articles featuring Government Engineering College, Barmer

articles.title: GEC Barmer Students Win National Robotics Competition
articles.summary: Students from Government Engineering College, Barmer secured first position in the National Robotics Competition held in Jaipur.

articles.title: GEC Barmer Launches New Research Center
articles.summary: Government Engineering College, Barmer inaugurated its new state-of-the-art research center focusing on sustainable energy solutions.

articles.title: GEC Barmer's Contribution to Rural Development
articles.summary: How GEC Barmer's students are making a difference in local communities through innovative projects.

articles.title: GEC Barmer Hosts National Technical Symposium
articles.summary: Government Engineering College, Barmer successfully organized a three-day National Technical Symposium attracting participants from across the country.

articles.title: GEC Barmer Signs MoU with Leading Tech Companies
articles.summary: Government Engineering College, Barmer signed Memorandums of Understanding with five leading technology companies to enhance industry-academia collaboration.

articles.title: GEC Barmer Students Develop Solar-Powered Vehicle
articles.summary: A team of mechanical engineering students from GEC Barmer developed an innovative solar-powered vehicle that won accolades at the National Solar Vehicle Challenge.
